text:
Pattali Makkal Katchi (PMK) Joint General Secretary M.Esakki released a pamphlet bearing the party’s Chief Ministerial Candidate Anbumani Ramadoss here on Monday.

Head of Election Propaganda Wing Ethiroli Maniyan and Deputy General Secretary R.Kalidoss received the first copy. Later party cadres distributed the bilingual pamphlet. The party released the pamphlet simultaneously in all districts, said Mr.Kalidoss.
title: PMK releases Anbumani’s profile
